reviews.name: yeckaplice
reviews.comment:
UK bigotry towards 'Turkish teeth' is appalling. I've seen nothing but professionalism in All on Dental. I'm writing this review just because I don't feel like the prejudice towards Turkish dental industry is at all just. Make sure you read your reviews and check certificates and you'll be absolutely fine.

The communication was very clear and prompt from when I inquired about the treatment over WhatsApp and it remained this way throughout.

When we arrived at the clinic, everyone spoke perfect English, was very polite and we talked at length about what were about to do after the x-ray.

Not for a moment did I feel uncomfortable. I was explained everything thoroughly and I was informed of every step.

The process itself was very quick, I reckon it took less time than actually discussing the work to be done.

My implants are healing nicely, I've been given antibiotics and other medication to control the healing process, and so far I've not experienced any issues.

After extraction of one tooth, the doctor discovered that there was too much infection underneath and didn't put an implant there and offered to either return the money of put it towards the next visit. He saw that there was a possibility of that when looking at the x-ray before beginning the work.

Not only that no one offered any unnecessary services to me, but they refused to do a replacement of a discoloured composite veneer due to lack of integrity of the tooth, the doctors said that it won't last and it'll chip. A less respectable doctor would do it but they saw that it'll create problems later on.

All in all, All on dental are as trustworthy and reliable as it can possibly be, and I look forward to my next visit.

reviews.name: Ian Cousins
reviews.comment:
I have been to all on dental a couple of times and every time I have been treated with warmth and professionalism.  There crowns are the best in the business in my opinion for natural shape and colour.

They are super efficient with transportation and treatment times with the help of Emre and Hafia.

I would recommend to all who are thinking of getting dental services from All on dental.

I would like to give a special mention to two people, firstly, Emre who went out of the way to make my experience special with guidance on local tourism information and places to dine.

Secondly Bozo who is like a brother, he treats you like you are family and has helped me not only with my experience with aftercare due to having to come back for a small issue but also issues of my health e.g. hair transplant, he gave me time and a great amount of support of what to expect and who to trust, which he didn't have to. So for that I am hugely grateful for.

My smile is now beyond my expectations and I am planning to bring my wife here shortly to have her smile designed
